258042.「よく来たな！ いい景色だろう！: Nice to see you! Nice view, isn't it!

258043.「ここが 貴様たちに用意した\n とっておきの 死に場所だ。: This is the perfect place for you to die.

258044.「……魔勇者アンルシア！？\n 貴様が 滅びの手だったのか！: Evil Hero Anlucia! You are Ruin's Hand!

258045.「妙だな。会ったばかりなのに……\n どうしてか 貴様のことが わかってしまう。:
It's strange. I just met you, but somehow I
know who you are.

258046.「一度は 勇者を名乗った者が\n 世界を滅ぼすことに 加担するとは……\n 堕ち:
That a man who once called himself Hero should
be complicit in the destruction of the
world...has fallen to the point of depravity.

258048.「フン。かつては 勇者として\n あがめられたものだが 今は ちがう。\n 煮え:
Hmm. I used to be celebrated as a Hero, but
not anymore. A simmering hatred has changed
me.

258049.「私は 滅びの手を勝利に導く刃。\n 滅びの剣アンルシア！:
I am the blade that leads Ruin's Hand to
victory. Anlucia, Sword of Ruin!

258050.「貴様ら 護りの手を始末し\n この無価値な世界を 滅ぼす！:
I will destroy you, my protectors, and I will
destroy this worthless world!

258051.「滅亡の瞬間を 目に焼きつけながら\n もろともに消滅する……ああっ そのとき\:
I will be struck with joy when I see the
moment of destruction and disappear with them
all... ah!

258052.「相棒。ここは 私に まかせてくれ。\n 奴を見てると ムカついて しょうがない:
Buddy. Let me handle this. I can't stand the
sight of him.

258053.「気が合うな。私も 貴様を見てると\n イライラしてくるよ。:
We're on the same page. You're driving me
crazy, too.

258054.「滅びの剣のチカラ……とくと見よ！: The power of the Sword of Doom... behold!

258055.「……あやつでは 心もとないな。\n 人選の あやまりではないのか？:
I'm not so sure about him. Isn't that a bit of
an oversight?

258056.「まあ 見てろって。なかなかのモンだぜ。\n 魔勇者の中の 世界への憎悪を材料に:
Well, you'll see. It's quite a feat. I took
the hatred of the world inside Hero and made
it into the most powerful Sword of Ruin.

258057.「勇者を望む奴らも この世界も\n 何もかも 腐りきっているッ！:
The people who want Hero, this world,
everything is rotten!

258058.「覚醒できなかった ひがみだろう！ \n 貴様は 真の勇者たりえなかった！:
You're just jealous you couldn't awaken! You
could never be a true Hero!

258059.「あはは！ 心底うれしいよ。\n しょせん 勇者は 私に似合う衣装じゃ\n なか:
Ha ha! I'm so glad. After all, Hero wasn't a
costume that suited me!

258060.「この世界が 窮屈で たまらなかった！\n 何にも しばられることなく 自由にチ:
I was so bored with the cramped conditions of
this world! How I wished I could freely use my
power without being restricted by anything!

258061.「勇者などッ！ 正義に束縛された\n 弱者のあやつり人形！ 弱者のイケニエッ！！:
Hero! A puppet of the weak, bound by
justice! The weak and handsome!

258062.「あやつり人形……だと？\n 訂正しろっ！\n 勇者への侮辱は この私が許さん！:
A puppet...? Correction! I will not allow you
to insult Hero!

258063.「こんな私でも……その存在に あこがれ \n 尊いと思う気持ちは 確かに 持って:
Even I, such as I am, have a longing for and
respect for that existence. Hero is the hope
of the people!

258064.「……そういうことだったのか。\n 私もまた 魔勇者アンルシア……。:
...So that's what that was all about. I, too,
am Evil Hero Anlucia...

258065.「かつての魔勇者は 勇者のチカラを \n 追い求めるあまり 外道に走りもしたが…:
Heroic men and women of the past, in their pursuit of the power of the Hero, sometimes went out of their way, but they also possessed
the heart to protect the world.

258066.「この世界を肯定する意思に 触れることで\n その心が揺さぶられ ようやく覚醒し:
It seems that being touched by the will to affirm this world has stirred its heart and finally awakened it. As a shield of
protection...

258067.「ファビエルめ……奴も 俺と同じように\n 魔勇者を 素材に選んだってわけか。:
Fabiel... so he chose Hero as his material
just like me.

258068.「もっとも 魔勇者の心は 大半が\n 世界への憎悪で 占められていた。:
But Hero's heart was mostly filled with hatred
for the world.

258069.「もともと 護りの盾として 生みだすには\n 不向きな素材だってのによぉ\n こ:
It's not a material that is suitable to be
used as a shield for protection, but now it's
awakening... interesting!

258070.「魔勇者の中にあったのは 圧倒的な憎悪！\n 護ろうとする意思など 気の迷いでし:
What was inside Hero was overwhelming hatred!
The will to protect you is nothing more than a
mere passing fancy. You are a tiny leftover!

258071.「いっちょう前に 正義をかかげるくせに\n 肝心の 勇者のチカラすらない。\n:
You raise yourself up to justice, but don't
even have the strength of a Hero, which is the
most important thing. You're not to be feared!

258072.「御託はいい！ かかってこいッ！\n 憎しみの化身である 貴様を倒すことで\n:
Enough of your nonsense! Come and get me! I
will overcome my past by defeating you, who
are hatred incarnate!

258074.「バカな！ 今さっき 覚醒したばかりの\n ザコなんぞに かなわぬとは……。:
What a fool! I can't believe I'm no match for
a zanpak that just awakened...

258075.「勝敗は 決した。\n 降参しろ。命までは 取らぬ。:
The game is won. Give up. I will not take your
life.

258077.「貴様は 大魔王マデサゴーラ！？: You are the Great Demon King Madesagora!

258078.「否！ 余は 滅びの手マデサゴーラである！: No! I am Madesagora, Ruin's Hand!

258079.「よく見れば そなたは いつぞやの……\n ふたたび 余の前に 立ちはだかるとは:
If I look closely, I can see that you are the same person who stood in front of me once before, and that you will stand before me
again.

258080.「貴様は この世界の 創造主であろう。\n 滅ぼすなど 論外のはず！:
You are the creator of this world. To destroy
it would be out of the question!

258081.「だからこそである。\n 余の創作活動は いまだ 道なかば。:
That is why. I am still in the middle of my
creative process.

258082.「勇者との戦いに 敗れたことより\n 未完の作品を残し 死んでしまったことが\n:
More than his defeat in the battle against
Hero, his death, leaving behind an unfinished
work, is his greatest regret and shame!

258083.「いかに 心魂を尽くした大作と言えど\n 未完の作品を 世に残すなど\n 芸術家:
However, he is not a great artist who left
unfinished works, even if they are great works
that he devoted his heart and soul to.

258084.「だが しかし！\n 余は 滅びの手として よみがえり\n 未完の作品を 完成さ:
But, but! I have been resurrected as Ruin's
Hand and have the opportunity to complete my
unfinished work.

258085.「世界創造という名の ひとつの芸術作品を\n 世界の破壊をもって仕上げる よろこ:
What a joy to finish this work of art, the
creation of the world, with the destruction of
the world! I am... behaving with delight!

258086.「貴様の身勝手で 滅ぼされて たまるか！\n 私が させない。私が 世界を護る！:
I will not let your selfishness destroy you! I
will not let it happen. I will protect the
world!

258088.「身のほどを 知れい！！\n 偽りの世界は 余の創作物であるぞ。\n 創るも 壊:
Know thyself! The false world is my creation.
I can create it or destroy it at my
discretion!

258089.「自らが創造した世界を 壊してこそ\n 余は 芸術の神髄へと 至れるのだ。\n:
Only by destroying the world of my own
creation will I be able to reach the essence
of art. All for the sake of art.

258090.「わ 私も手を貸すぞ……滅びの手よ。: I will lend you my hand...Ruin's Hand.

258092.「ともに 世界を滅ぼそう！: Together we will destroy the world!

258094.「貴様こそ 余の失敗作であった。\n 奈落の門を開けるための 道具として\n 創:
You are my failure. I created you as a tool to
open the Abyss Gate.

258095.「最期まで 使えぬ奴であったなぁ。: He was useless until the end of his life.

258096.「相棒すら 切り捨てるかッ！！\n 見下げはてた奴め！ 立ちあえ！:
You're gonna cut off your own partner! You're
a disgrace! Stand up!

258097.「グフハハハ……そう せくな。\n 破魂の審判が 結末を迎えるには まだ早い。\:
Don't be so hasty. It is still early for the
Judgement of Souls to reach its conclusion.
Let's enjoy the sideshow for a while.

258098.「不出来な 滅びの剣とのちがいを\n 見せてやろうぞ！ グワッハッハッハァー！:
Let me show you the difference between this
sword and the ill-advised Sword of
Ruin! Gwahhhh!

258099.「……敵とはいえ 自分の似姿が\n 切り捨てられるサマは……胸くそ悪い。:
...the sight of one's likeness being
truncated, even by one's enemies,
is...disgusting.

258100.「ようやく あれの始末ができるな。: We can finally take care of that thing.

258101.「いろいろ 報告もあるし ヒズミを消したあと\n 一度 ファビエルのもとに戻ろう:
I have a lot to report, and once I'm done with
Hizmi, I'll go back to Fabiel.
